title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 427 - STANDARDS OF PAYMENT FOR FOSTER CARE OF CHILDREN
content:

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 427

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 355, 363-a, 378[a][2], [5], 398-a; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 2000, ch. 145

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
